name: EnBox
overview:
The EnBox Anti-Spam solution; is a cloud based Spam filtration platform designed to grow with small, medium and large companies. Using 13 different filtering stages & a combination of at least 3 anti-virus platforms to eliminate spam, Malware & phishing scams before they reach your network, our platform has exceptionally low false positives rates, ensuring that that all legitimate mail is delivered and all “Junk Mail”, eliminated.

EnBox has been developed to allow you to concentrate on the one thing: Your Business. Our solution allows you to get to work on serving your customers, whilst we take care of managing spam, Malware and security risks and eliminating them from your inbox.

As spammers and hackers are always evolving their methodologies, we have written the EnBox algorithm to do the same, allowing us to identify newly written Spam and Malware emails as they happen. But best of all, our email security system not only scans your incoming mail for Spam, but as we reside in the cloud, we detect and eliminate Spam, Phishing scams, Malware and Viruses before they enter your network. With advanced coding being used by Spammers and hackers, using a solution that scans emails which are already in your network is often too late, the damage has been done.

milestones.description: EnBox has today announced today that Mark Sharma will take over the reins of Chief Executive Officer.  With 25yrs experience in the Industry, "Mark has the drive and knowledge to make EnBox a global company, with the complete understanding of the product
